title: Dual sim color coding or theming.
content: I am wondering if there is a way to separate the messages and calls based on which sim is used. And/or if I can choose a separate default sim for seperate profiles on my device. ie: using my work number sim on my work profile and personal sim on my default profile. Either on the device itself or within the phone and message app respectively.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
